entry.title: Safe and Sound
entry.summary:
Author: Boltbot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 117,135Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 1,544

Summary: Bruce opened his eyes. A red cape rippled in the wind above him. A gold symbol‚Äîbold, and bright‚Äîstood out against the deep blue of a suit that barely seemed real. And then the face. Calm, focused, and unabashedly kind. Superman. ‚ÄúYou alright?‚Äù the hero asked, voice deep and sure, like the world wasn‚Äôt ending around them. Bruce blinked, not sure what surprised him more‚Äîthe fact that he was alive, or the man who‚Äôd made sure of it. ‚ÄúI-I am now,‚Äù he muttered, mind still scrambling after the fall. Superman‚Äôs smile was subtle, but real. ‚ÄúYou know, I never get tired of hearing that.‚Äù And just like that, Bruce Wayne‚Äîwho‚Äôd accepted death‚Äîwas held in the arms of something he didn‚Äôt believe in. Hope. ¬† ‚™ª‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄñ§ì‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚™º ¬† Billionaire Bruce Wayne reluctantly attends a charity gala in Metropolis to represent Wayne Enterprises and support the city‚Äôs post-crisis recovery. entry.title: Pushing It Down and Praying
entry.summary:
Author: alexcath

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,958Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 23

Summary: Clark can't have sex with Lois without picturing Bruce instead. Of course, he feels incredibly guilty but doesn't know what to do about it. After a gruesome fight, Bruce calls Clark for help, which Clark answers in a heartbeat. Almost losing his best friend makes something snap in Clark, and he kisses him. To his surprise, Bruce returns it with passion. They throw all their precautions out the window and give in to their selfish desires, not thinking of the aftermath. Plot heavily inspired by Lizzy McAlpine's Pushing It Down and Praying. (I would like to extend a public apology to Lois Lane. I'm so sorry, girl. I love you.) (Also, I'm awful at summaries. entry.title: raison d'√™tre
entry.summary:
Author: ilovepinkandcoffee

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,525Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 294

Summary: (n.) a reason for existingA year after the Riddler‚Äôs attack on Gotham, Batman struggles to repair a city fractured and drowning in crime. But when rumors spread through Gotham‚Äôs criminal underworld about an alien hero in Metropolis‚Äîan otherworldly figure with god-like powers who‚Äôs changing the course of history‚ÄîBruce can't help but be skeptical. But his concerns are confirmed when this so-called "Superman," arrives in Gotham one night during his patrol, bringing with him a wave of chaos that threatens to disrupt the fragile balance he has fought so hard to maintain.Clark had heard about Gotham City when he first arrived at Metropolis‚Äîa lawless, crime-ridden city plagued with corruption‚Äîbut he had never felt the need to enter its borders. That is until he learns of a mysterious vigilante known as "The Batman," a figure who, like him, seeks justice for his city and its people, his curiosity gets the better of him. Drawn to the idea of meeting someone with a shared mission, Clark decides to seek out the elusive hero, after all, nothing bad can come out of it can it? But boy was he wrong.

Summary: Whale-fall ecosystems support an abundance of life in waves of successive communities. The carrion of the whale is first stripped of all its flesh by larger scavengers. entry.title: Devour Me
entry.summary:
Author: TPWK28HS

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,314Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 33

Summary: That night, Bruce Wayne didn‚Äôt just lose his parents‚Ä¶ he also lost the ability to taste anything. He awakened as a Folk: nothing fills him, nothing can satisfy the emptiness inside. The Joker takes every chance to tempt him, but his flavor, though intense, is so cloying and nauseating that it pushes Bruce to the edge, making him hate Cakes. Until he tastes him.Clark Kent. A reporter who, by accident, reveals himself to be a Cake. But not just any Cake: to Bruce, he‚Äôs addictive, igniting him instantly and leaving him with a single desire‚Ä¶ to devour him again. Clark promises to keep the secret, but he runs. Bruce won‚Äôt allow it. From that moment on, Kent becomes his obsession. Yet Clark, despite all his empathy, hides an even greater secret: he must conceal that he is Superman. He tries to escape this dangerous game, but when his family‚Äôs farm is at risk, Bruce offers him a deal he can‚Äôt refuse: save it‚Ä¶ in exchange for becoming his sustenance. A convenient arrangement‚Ä¶ or the beginning of a bond that will devour everything?

entry.title: feels like an eternity
entry.summary:
Author: daddyjackfrost

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,106Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 47

Summary: ‚ÄúIf New York doesn‚Äôt want me anymore,‚Äù he said into the dusk, the words not quite a prayer and not entirely a joke, ‚ÄúI wish to be someplace that does.‚Äù That's all it was, a simple wish. But magic is unpredictable and it's not done with Peter yet. Gotham wants Peter even though Peter doesn't want it. He's far from home with no way back in sight. All he can do now is build something tangible. Something real. It won't be easy, though. Not when his heart longs to be with those who have left him.
